Journal Story: Hey, just created my account and figuring out this site. Excited to meet everyone on the trail in 2016! Ordered my first real peice of equipment, a Zpack haul 24oz 60L bag! Anyway, hope I'm posting this correctly and see you all in a year!
Planning on hiking this with my girlfriend. Just wondering what gear we should share in case one of us drops out,worst case scenario.
How do people update these on the trail? From what I've heard there aren't many hostels with computers, so just smart phone updating I assume?

People on the trail now are reporting a lot of trash and large of groups of People are hiking, sometimes entire families. Sometimes 30 People to a shelter. I'm guessing movies like "wild" and "a walk in the woods" (coming out next year I think) are making thru hikes more popular.To avoid the crowds I'm going to start mid-feb and deal with the harsh cold. Anyone reading this could try a South bound trip to avoid crowds. I'll also pick up some trash along the way. Hopefully everyone pitches in to make the AT a nice place for everyone.
